Oubliette - ebuild version bumps
An extremely simple screen locking utility based on xtrlock. Supports multiple hash-types, shadow passwords, and PAM.
Version 2.x was forked from mgumz/alock in 2014 by Arkadiusz Bokowy
Version 1.x was written in 2005-2011 by Mathias Gumz Original project page - https://darkshed.net/projects/alock https://github.com/mgumz/alock
